# JuaTz - A Public Digital Platform for Tanzania ## Requirement Summary JuaTz is envisioned as a public digital platform and web library aimed at connecting Tanzanians and global users interested in Tanzania. The platform will feature a variety of core functionalities, including a news feed, job opportunities, an experts directory, a web library, an art market, a real-time chat system, and more. The design will prioritize mobile accessibility and user engagement. ## Code Generated ### HTML Structure (index.html) ```html JuaTz - Your Community Hub
